originalText.text: Dr. Minutillo has been my physician since I moved back to NY in 2017. Thanks to him I was able to get properly diagnosed to cancer after several ‚Äúdoctors‚Äù missed it because I was too ‚Äúyoung‚Äù to have cancer, at which point it was stage 3. I owe him my life, I don‚Äôt ever have a problem with referrals or anything that comes from the office. The staff is efficient and helpful. Dr Min takes care of my entire family.

originalText.text:
I find Dr. Minutillo a thorough, kind and "easy to speak to" physician. His staff is intelligent, helpful and agreeable. The office is very clean and he has all the up-to- date medical devices such as EKG, and another machine that they can actually watch and monitor the heart  in all of its phases. His staff takes blood and urine samples to send to labs so that he can  monitor all of your body's functions.

I couldn't ask for more.

originalText.text:
Dr. John Minutillo has been my Cardiologist since early 2000s. I became his patient after my HEART ATTACK! I still remember meeting him for the 1st time at Lenox Hill Hospital. He is ALWAYS patient with me (even when I don't follow his order)! When I became a little depressed following some major health setbacks, he DIDN'T become annoyed or frustrated with me! Dr. Minutillo continues BE PATIENT with a few strong pushes!!

And because I know he is a GREAT Doctor, I recommended him to my LOVE/FRIEND/FIANC√â!!!

FYI- All the Doctors, Nurses & Staff are really GREAT at Progressive Medical Associates!! üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü
